name: CookGPT(Work in progress)
description: AI powered cooking assistant. Utilisizes OpenAI API and elastic search to recommend recipes based on user's skill level, dietary/food preferences, and ingredient availability.

name: Sonicscore
description: A music rating site created for a school project. Backend was written in PHP and features a RESTful API server. Frontend was written in React.

name: Sonicscore mobile app
description: An android app version of the sonicscore website. Recycled the backend server from the website.

name: Laravel Backend Demo
description: A demo backend server created using Laravel. Fully functional RESTful API server with authentication and authorization.
